name: Aporo
description:
Aporo is a serious game concept about fighting super bugs, teaching players the importance of the right use of antibiotics to cure bacterial infection.

In this prototype,

  • defeat 4 type of bacteria matching the right antibiotic colour
  • watch out for using the right antibiotic to avoid the creation of super bugs
  • use the Super Antibiotic to destroy the super bugs
  • can you survive to 100 bacteria?

Being a prototype, the game lacks a proper onboarding, difficulty calibration and there are little imperfections with some behaviours.

Windows only. Use of touchscreen is highly recommended.

WARNING: the game must be played with 1080p resolution, because at the moment UI is unresponsive.
